ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Unique twisting keypad; 2-megapixel digital camera with video capture; MP3/video player
Bluetooth for handsfree devices; MicroSD memory expansion
Up to 3 hours of talk time and 245 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 3250 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera, MP3/Video Player, MicroSD Slot--International Version with Warranty (Black)
